programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una tormenta masiva embarca al equipo de NCIS en el USS Borealis, donde todos se convierten en sospechosos una vez que la escena del crimen revela que la Madre Naturaleza no era la única responsable.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una reservista Naval acude al equipo de NCIS luego de volver a su casa y encontrar el living de su casa ensangrentado y a su esposo desaparecido.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras que el equipo de NCIS investiga el asesinato de un oficial del Mossad en Virginia, Tony y Ziva viajan a Berlín para rastrear al asesino de su padre.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Consecuencias del pasado
programme.desc: Danny y Baez buscan a una banda de ladrones en una ola de crímenes, y se unen al detective Jimmy Mosley, quien años atrás rompió el corazón de Baez.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Hacia lo inimaginable
programme.desc: El asesino en serie Thomas Wilder desafía a Danny con un mensaje en su última víctima, convirtiendo el juego del gato y el ratón en una venganza personal.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La milla extra
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony emprenden una búsqueda para encontrar a un testigo clave que huyó por miedo a represalias y convencerlo de testificar.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Boomerang
programme.desc: Estalla la indignación pública cuando no se procesa a un policía que disparó a un adolescente, afectando a Frank, el alcalde y la oficina de Erin. Danny busca al autor de un posterior tiroteo contra un oficial, posible caso de venganza.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una chica de 18 años escapa de una casa suburbana donde estuvo cautiva por años con otras dos mujeres, el UAC busca al sospechoso que las secuestró.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC lleva a cabo una búsqueda en Los Ángeles después de que el equipo descubre imágenes de seguridad que muestran a un sospechoso siendo invitado a las casas de las víctimas.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La esposa de un Marine especializado en la detección de bombas K-9 urge al equipo de NCIS para que investigue la reciente muerte de su marido en Afghanistan.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una tormenta masiva embarca al equipo de NCIS en el USS Borealis, donde todos se convierten en sospechosos una vez que la escena del crimen revela que la Madre Naturaleza no era la única responsable.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una reservista Naval acude al equipo de NCIS luego de volver a su casa y encontrar el living de su casa ensangrentado y a su esposo desaparecido.

programme.title: Party Down South

programme.title: Party Down South

programme.desc: Jared hatches another "get rich quick" scheme. Doug finds out Wendy has moved on... with lawn care. And Aimee forces Chris to bond with his new son-in-law.

programme.desc: Aimee hosts a Mexican themed fiesta for Mason's friend to prove the family isn't racist, Doug goes speed dating, and Christian drops a bomb on the family.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug takes the guys to the Super Bowl of single life: Spring Break! They convince the girls they're headed to a vineyard, but after a few drinks, their lies start to unravel.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug crashes at Tommy and Tammy's and shares a bunk bed with Hunter. Chris goes overboard at a storage auction, and Jared tries to make the next big internet video.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris and Aimee try to spice up their love life. Jared opens a Haunted Frog Gigging Tour, and Wendy goes on a date!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug and Wendy co-host a birthday party for Presley. Chris puts Mason through a boot camp, and Jared wins a timeshare!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The family gets settled into their new Bahamas villa and Jared uses the home owner card to get onto a mega yacht.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A biker with a history of stealing vehicles doesn’t know how to drive his motorcycle. A man in- between jobs takes up a sketchy method of earning money. Deputies strongly question the legitimacy of a man’s work van.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Three male suspects are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at a nearby apartment complex. An officer is alarmed when she discovers an older male is the boyfriend of a teenager.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young carjacking suspect in custody gets a tongue-lashing from his mom and aunt, a man terrorizing his mom gets tased, and police give chase to a familiar vehicle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver takes his unsuspecting passenger on a wild ride as he tries to evade police, a man's date is cut short by a traffic stop, and police are called to evict a roommate.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man apologizes profusely after leading an officer on a foot chase, a passenger in a car chase tells conflicting tales, and police find a wanted man on a roof.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman leads police on a dangerous chase, a driver is remorseful for the damage he's caused, and a man's denial of solicitation is undermined by his open fly.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police go off-roading to follow a stolen car, a man has odd excuses for having suspicious items, and an officer settles a dispute between a wife and her jealous husband.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A fleet-footed deputy nabs a suspect on the run, officers responding to a domestic call are refused entry, and police try to ascertain the cause of a woman's hallucinations.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspected car thief's claims of innocence are undermined by a video he shot of himself earlier that day, and the pursuit of a suspected drunk driver has a surprising end.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man leads officers on a frantic foot-chase, deputies assist two teens in tracking down a man who stole their bike, and a dispute between roommates takes a dark turn.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police deploy spike strips to curb a stolen vehicle, a parolee at large speeds away with a two-month-old in the car, and officers try to determine the details of a stabbing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who attempt to purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies pull a man from a devastating car wreck after a high-speed chase, officers apprehend and question a robbery suspect, and a wanted man tries to flee from police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers are dumbfounded when a man tries to talk them into taking him to jail. Sparks fly when a driver tries to take his truck on the freeway with only two wheels. Deputies are on guard when they approach a belligerent man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers spot a suspect running down the street with a knife, the driver of a stolen car takes off on foot after he's pulled over, and police find carjacked vehicles.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect fresh out of jail is found with narcotics. A motorcycle named 'Love Machine' is saved from a hot wire. A man bursts his tire in a bad place and officers come to the rescue.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Suspects flee an overturned auto, a man is accused of battery with a chain leash, and an unlucky gambler is dealt another losing hand by police when he decides to drive drunk.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A quiet passenger makes a run for it during a traffic stop, a stolen puppy is safely returned to its family, and a struggling woman hits a speed bump on her road to recovery.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distressed woman leads the cops to her abusive fiance, and a couple of officers are suspicious when they pull over an overly friendly man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man has a hard time making his case when a bag of illicit items has his name on it. A talkative driver tells officers a long story with conflicting details. A couple calls for help when they find an alligator in their yard.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a routine traffic stop, an Officer recognizes the passengers from a prior drug related arrest. A K-9 unit assists in the pursuit of a grand theft auto suspect who flees on foot.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A trespassing suspect claims to be a federal informant, officers inspect an erratically driven car and find a safe, and a familiar face swears this time she's going to rehab.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick is in charge for the first time as the team investigates the murder of the con artist, who has run off with some tourists' money only to get shot and killed in the parking lot. The prime suspect in the case turns out to be Captain Brass' daughter.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team is called in when a famous real estate entrepreneur is found dead in a hotel elevator.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Sara are called to the crime scene when two murder victims are found hidden in pipes at a construction site in the middle of an alfalfa field, while Catherine and Nick investigate an ostensible hunting accident.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom's nemesis, serial killer Paul Millander, reappears and claims a third victim in this gripping episode.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine is ordered by a kidnapper to accompany a man who is to deliver $1 million in ransom to him or else he will kill the man's mistress.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom investigates the murder of a Las Vegas photographer whose remains were dumped at a nearby body farm.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Catherine and Sara are called in to investigate when a hockey player dies during a practice. Warrick and Nick look into the apparent drug-related death of a sax player at a casino.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom investigates the murders of four monks who were shot point-blank while chanting in a Buddhist temple.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A bus carrying 23 passengers from Los Angeles to Las Vegas crashes less than 40 miles from its destination, killing nine people.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Jane Galloway is a nervous breakdown waiting to happen. She has completely shielded herself from the outside world, but that doesn't stop a stalker in her attic from killing her.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate the stabbing death of an 80-year-old woman who lived in a run-down house full of cats.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Sara investigate when a man's body, which has been doused with lye, is found buried in a park.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his crew handle their highest profile case to date when the city's former chief of detectives is slain execution-style in his house following a wild party.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate when the body of an unidentified young woman is discovered stuffed in an overturned shopping cart near a freeway underpass.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Catherine y Sara tienen que investigar la muerte de un jugador de hockey durante un entrenamiento. Warrick y Nick investigan la aparente muerte relacionada con las drogas de un saxofonista en un casino.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the remaining ladies try out for the media-savvy Show Group, Judy and Kelli are faced with yet another difficult decision, and some dancers rise to glory while others' hearts are broken.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Makeovers give the dancers renewed confidence, alum Yuko shares exciting personal news, veteran Lisa makes a hard decision, and Kelli questions Alora-Rose about a rumored distraction.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Week nine of training camp intensifies when Kelli and Judy confront Alora-Rose and deliberate squad dismissal decisions one week before the first game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy slyly make the final squad announcement, and the new team faces several obstacles before taking the field for their first game as Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds will audition but only 45 girls will secure a spot in the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders training camp. DCC director Kelli Finglass presides over the process with a keen eye for talent and beauty.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Training camp gets underway as the girls are introduced to a grueling schedule of dance rehearsals with choreographer Judy Trammell and fitness instructor Jay Johnson.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Reality sets in and the mental and physical stress of training camp hits the girls hard.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Super Bowl XXX MVP Larry Brown and current Dallas Cowboy Ryan Fowler school the training camp candidates with the ultimate football challenge. The girls are tested on their NFL knowledge and athletic skills on the field.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Beauty is the name of the game as the training camp candidates get major hair makeovers in preparation for their first solo publicity stills. But not everyone is picture perfect and by the end of the week, there will be a heartbreaking elimination.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The end of training camp is just around the corner and after Kelli's annual etiquette luncheon the girls are on their best behavior. A tough new choreographer introduces the girls to real dance technique with devastating results.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The candidates find themselves in front of the camera for a crash course in how to deal with the media. The judges from the open call are brought back to have their final say.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The summer is coming to a close, and there are now 36 girls poised to become America's sweethearts. Kelli and Judy are concerned the team is not ready and there may have to be more cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of excited and anxious Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders hopefuls arrive at Texas Stadium for the preliminary auditions. After performing their freestyle dance routines for the judges, only half make it to the semi-finals.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: In the final audition, the competition really heats up. Now, surviving candidates must go head-to-head against experienced veteran cheerleaders for a coveted spot in the DCC Training Camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Making it this far is one thing - enduring Training Camp is another. The hopeful group of 43 is far from the final squad, and DCC Director Kelli Finglass quickly reminds them that there will be cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Only two weeks into training camp, it's time to start making cuts. While "veteran" cheerleaders model bikinis for their upcoming calendar shoot, anxious training camp "rookies" dance their hearts out to prove to Kelli and Judy that they deserve to stay.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: After saying goodbye to one of their own, reality sets in for the remaining training camp candidates: nobody's position on the squad is secure. The girls are fitted for the revealing DCC uniforms, then sweat their way through a punishing physical workout

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The training camp candidates don't know what hit them when tough as nails and brutally honest guest choreographer Kitty Carter teaches a class. Then, the rookies get one step closer to transforming into Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies get to wear the iconic Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders uniform for the very first time during a professional modeling shoot. Then the girls have a life-changing experience skydiving with the legendary Army parachute team, the Golden Knights!

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: DCC training camp comes down to the last grueling rehearsals and whose long legs fit into the famous kick-line. The cheerleaders attend a bikini boot-camp for last-minute toning. Then, amid tears of disappointment and shock, Kelli makes the final cuts.

programme.title: According to Him & Her
programme.desc: After a divorce, is it okay to live together for the kids? If you're separated, are you single? Is dating a starving artist okay? After a divorce, do you still go to your step-child's birthday parties?

programme.title: According to Him & Her
programme.desc: It's ok to invite your Ex to your wedding. It's ok for a man to put off marriage until he is financially stable? Sex tapes spice up relationships.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s exam time and everyone’s stressed – especially Craig. In a surprise visit from his father, Craig learns that his dad is very eager to have him back in his life.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Although his father is gone, Craig wants to get on with his life as normal. He insists on going back to school immediately and becomes frustrated with his friends when they behave with concern.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The pending birth a new baby for Spike and Snake inspires Emma to search for her birth father. With some detective work, Emma discovers that her father, Shane, lives just outside the city.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The pending birth a new baby for Spike and Snake inspires Emma to search for her birth father. With some detective work, Emma discovers that her father, Shane, lives just outside the city.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s on a mission this year—it’s bye bye cute and hello hot. That means midriff baring tops, low-riders and thongs.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige organizes a final hurrah at the beach and even convinces her older brother, Dylan, to act as chauffeur. Spinner’s a bit put-off by Dylan’s openly gay attitude, but his presence is an eye-opener for Marco.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner just can’t deal with the fact that Marco’s gay so he tries to cut Marco out of life. But when the guys all go to see Dylan’s hockey game, Jimmy makes sure that Marco comes along.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things haven’t been going very well for Sean lately. Emma’s busy dealing with Snake’s illness and a brand new baby brother and Tracker’s busy leading the exciting life a normal 20-something.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are pretty hot between Craig and Ashley, but he’s disappointed that she keeps pulling back from going all the way.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Life’s getting more and more stressful for Ellie—her dad just left on another Peacekeeping Mission, her mom’s drinking again and she’s interning for Caitlin Ryan’s tv show. As things get more and more hectic, Ellie has no one to help her cope.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma decides it’s time to move on in matters of the heart when she realizes she has feelings for new kid Chris.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Terri’s in heaven-- not only does she have a terrific boyfriend, the wonderful romantic Rick, she also has the lead in the school play!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are back on track for Emma now that she’s officially over Sean. Chris has even asked her out! But when she hears rumours that Sean’s part of a gang stealing things from Degrassi (including Mr. Simpson’s laptop)

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s a big gymnastics meet at Degrassi, and Manny’s going to lead the team to gold! But when she starts to feel sick, she fears that her queasy stomach might be more than the flu or even a bad nerves.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s tempted by the romantic family scenario Craig paints and begins to think she and Craig really could keep this baby. Even Ashley shares the news with the entire cafeteria.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Five kids from different worlds are stuck in a room -- on a Saturday! When Raditch introduces Saturday detention, Sean, Ellie, Hazel, Jimmy and Toby are the first inductees.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Just when Terri thought she’d gotten over her ex boyfriend, Rick, he makes a concerted effort to win back her affections. She and her friends are wary – after all, leopards can’t change their spots.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s determined that he and the guys will be the “Last Band Standing” at Degrassi’s battle of the bands and win a spot on the show. So he sets the guys a fierce practice schedule and starts to write a killer new song.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The year-end Junior Formal is fast approaching, and Marco is in charge, except when it comes to a date. Problem is, Marco’s too nervous to ask Dylan out at all, let alone ask him to the prom.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A stressed-out Paige and Spinner decide they need a break and skip school for the day. Ashley, meanwhile, is in the doldrums, too “sick” to go to school. So when Ashley calls Paige to get her homework, Paige decides Ash needs to join them in a little fun.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Once again, as things finally start to come together for Sean, the other shoe drops - his brother and guardian, Tracker, has found a new job in Alberta. Sean thinks his life is over until he finds out that he can legally live on his own.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The year end semi-formal is only hours away and Marco has transformed the gym into an idealized Bombay. It promises to be an amazing event, except Marco’s theme is causing tension between him and Ellie. Ellie finds the whole idea racist

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s the end of summer and Paige receives some unexpected news - her rape case has finally made it to trial and she’s the star witness. Finally…justice!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Shocked by the outcome of the trial, Paige holes up in her room. But when Marco is able to coax her out to party at Dylan’s dorm with the gang, things go from bad to worse when she and Spinner have a blow-out fight.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s a shoo-in for Student Council President until Alex enters the race. While at first Alex seems an unlikely candidate, her strong opinions and anti-establishment platform take hold with the students and Marco realizes she might well win.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur

programme.desc: The anniversary of Faith's death is at hand and Grace shows no sign of giving up her pursuit of Mac; Triumph Pastor Basie Skanks and Jacob receive bad news regarding Triumph Two's finances.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Jacob makes Basie an offer to clear his debt and gain full control of Triumph II; Mac receives bad news from Skip Leonard, which puts him an explosive collision course with Grace.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Grace and Mac's showdown sends shockwaves through the family; Jacob offers the Bishop an olive branch; Kevin makes a decision that leaves Charity reeling.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Jacob and Kerissa establish their new ministry; Charity desperately tries to reach Kevin; Darius gets an offer that may take him out of Memphis, leaving Grace to wonder where she fits in his life.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: When Sophia and Zora are excluded from the upcoming debutante Cotillion, Lady Mae sets out to make things right; Grace is inspired by Basie's sermon; Charity reaches out to Carlton.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Angela searches for the mole; Ghost works to regain the club deal; Kanan exerts a dark influence upon Tariq; Milan warns Tommy about the price of betrayal.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost attempts to retrieve evidence while throwing the party of his career; Tasha forms an unlikely alliance in an effort to save her family; Tommy considers a move that could change everyone's lives.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost faces threats from all sides following his arrest for the murder of Agent Knox; Tasha scrambles to get bail as the Feds begin to build their case; Tommy navigates his new role and enlists help in recovering Tariq.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Proctor works to protect his client as Ghost faces harassment; the team discusses its strategy for taking down St. Patrick; Tommy struggles to let go of his old duties; Tasha talks to the children about what is going on.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappears and her husband becomes the prime suspect — especially after police find a huge bloodstain on the carpet of their bedroom. When they spray the bedroom with Luminol, they discover it was awash with blood spatter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Scott Dunn goes missing, police spray his bedroom with Luminol and uncover a scene of horrific violence. Now investigators face a daunting task: proving that Scott Dunn had been murdered without a body, a witness or a murder weapon.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1971, John List left a note with the bodies of his mother, wife and three children in his mansion ballroom before disappearing completely. Detectives must solve the case, despite having only an outdated photograph of List.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fifteen-year-old boy dies from a mysterious gunshot wound to the head while sitting in the lobby of his father's gun club. Ballistics, laser technology, made-to-scale models and the latest in forensic animation are used to find the cause.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors cannot pinpoint the source of a businessman's illness.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, a 12-year-old was found murdered in her Minnesota home. Despite a meticulous search of the home and an exhaustive investigation, police had no suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are led on a wild goose chase when the wife of a prominent banker is kidnapped. An entomologist's unexpected discovery leads to a new suspect — and the realization that ordinary office equipment can leave extraordinary clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1987, a human skull and some bones were discovered at a Boy Scout Camp near Farmington, Missouri. Facial reconstruction aids the investigators in this case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On the night of May 22, 1992, Betty Wilson returned home after a meeting and discovered her husband lying in a pool of blood. Jack Wilson had obviously been murdered — but how?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, Susan Fassett was gunned down as she left her church choir practice in Poughkeepsie, NY. After clearing her husband, police turned their attention to Fred Andros, with whom Susan had an affair.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A lifelong resident of the tiny town of Lefroy, Tasmania was murdered outside his own home. Robbery appeared to be the motive, but with no suspects, the investigation came to a halt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Who was the sexual offender who murdered two adolescent boys in Nebraska? The key to stopping him would be the unique composition of the "junk rope" he used to tie his victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A behavioral profile caused the Baton Rouge Police Department to search for the wrong man. The real perpetrator may have eluded arrest, had it not been for a molecular biologist who painted DNA picture of the suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The doctors at the hospital couldn't determine the cause of Bobby Curley's hallucinations and intense pain. They treated it as a neurological disorder but his condition deteriorated. He was being poisoned.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In this international case of extortion, murder and stolen identities, scam-artist Albert J. Walker assumes the identity of co-worker Ronald Platt. Platt later turns up dead in an ocean with an anchor tied around his torso.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Faced with three homicides that appear to be professional executions, investigators on both sides of the Atlantic must find a common thread between the victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Tooth or Consequences
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of Katie Poirier is stymied by the lack of a body. Finally, investigators use a single tooth found among some charred remains to identify her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the 1990s, the media dubbed Richard Rogers the "Last Call Killer" because he targeted men in gay bars who were obviously intoxicated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the state of Florida was known for more than just Disney World. Worldwide attention focused on a rash of robberies which targeted tourists. Some vacationers were killed in these attacks, but some fought and survived.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mysterious computer crash pushed a thriving manufacturing company to the brink of collapse, jeopardizing hundreds of employees' jobs. Forensic investigators must determine if the crash was the result of a computer defect, human error or sabotage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of a young woman was found a mile from her abandoned car. Police were especially concerned when they realized the victim had come to them for protection just two weeks earlier after a road rage incident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Nancy Newman and her two daughters are found brutally murdered. The crime scene has no shortage of evidence, but investigators cannot find a conclusive link to their prime suspect. To solve the puzzle, an FBI analyst designs a unique experiment.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2003, Kathy Lorick was murdered on a Concord, California jogging trail while talking to her husband on her mobile phone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a dedicated, well-respected teacher disappeared, police had to determine if she'd gone on vacation without telling anyone or if she was the victim of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: By using techniques she saw on forensic science TV shows, a mother determines who was responsible for the accident that permanently injured her 4-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For 15 months, a serial killer was strangling prostitutes in Florida, then taunting police by leaving the bodies in plain sight. The only clues were a tire impression and some threads.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los diez cocineros restantes deben hacer tapas con las sobras. Un error de un Chef hace que ambos equipos tengan un casi fracaso.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay desafía los paladares de los equipos en una prueba de sabor a ciegas. En un servicio de cena abarrotado, la ansiedad es mayor de lo normal cuando pasan las celebridades Eric McCormack y Robert Patrick.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El resto de los Chefs deberán preparar un plato a base de cangrejos y cada equipo presentará su plato más fuerte al Chef Ramsay. Durante el servicio de cena, los equipos crean sus propios menús.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay separa a los equipos. Ahora los seis Chefs restantes están solos, cada uno preparando un plato con catorce ingredientes simples.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Después de un viaje a Atlantic City Borgata, donde el ganador pronto será un gran Chef, los competidores deben preparar un plato original que se servirá en el aclamado hotel.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay cocina para los cuatro Chefs restantes y luego les dice que repitan lo que han preparado. Posteriormente, se planea una propuesta de sorpresa para el menú de postres.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Se espera que los tres finalistas preparen una comida para 100 de los mejores Chefs de Los Ángeles. El ganador aparece en un programa de televisión, mientras que los perdedores tienen que lavar y planchar la ropa de cama.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos finalistas deberán trabajar con un arquitecto para diseñar los espacios del restaurante para el desafío de la cena final.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos últimos concursantes se enfrentan en su última competencia de la cena final. El ganador asume el cargo de Chef en el Borgata Hotel, Casino and Spa en Atlantic City.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la primera parte del estreno de la temporada, dieciséis concursantes tienen la oportunidad de alcanzar el estrellato culinario y un puesto de Chef ejecutivo en la ciudad turística canadiense de Whistler, Columbia Británica.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la parte final del estreno de temporada, vuelve un competidor de la quinta temporada y los quince cocineros restantes se preparan para una cena marinera.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay despierta a los Chefs restantes en medio de la noche y les ordena que preparen una cena de espaguetis para los bomberos hambrientos. Los perdedores deben lavar y encerar los camiones de bomberos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los competidores deben crear perros calientes de proporciones perfectas para las celebridades Drew Lachey, John O'Hurley, Tom Green, Melinda Clarke, Christopher 'Kid' Reid y Kristy Swanson.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los doce Chefs restantes deberán planificar un saludo gastronómico por el regreso de un marine americano. El equipo perdedor tendrá que limpiar y decorar la fiesta de Tana Ramsay.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One Team is stranded in Indonesia as they watch their competition race by, and two Teams join forces to push through a mind-numbing mental challenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams struggle with an underwater challenge which threatens their positions in the game, and one team’s love for the outdoors comes in handy during a tough climbing challenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Fearing they have broken the rules, one team takes a risk that could cost them the Race. Meanwhile, an unwanted speed bump turns into a dream excursion for Liz and Marie, but will it push them even farther back.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After falling to the back of the pack, a disheartened racer is encouraged by the spirit of the local workers, and it’s an intense foot race to the first-ever Pit Stop in Malawi.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Malawi where a puzzling patriotic Roadblock causes one team to fall behind. Also, with a Double U-Turn on the line, teams must choose whether to sabotage their fellow Racers for a chance at first place.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The Race travels to Copenhagen for the first time, where one Racer learns the meaning of two left feet and a double U-turn jeopardizes team positions in the Race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After a potentially game-changing error, one team hopes for a lucky break, and donning only a Speedo for their Detour task, Racers get in touch with their inner exhibitionists.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers put the pedal to the metal and shift into high gear when they take a thrilling test drive, and results are far from sweet when teams also try to recreate classic Belgian waffles.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four teams make their way to Panama City, where they come face-to-face with their fears as they take in astonishing views of the city skyline.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After racing through 4 continents, 20 cities and nearly 40,000 miles, the final three teams race to Atlanta, Ga., where a smooth landing evades one team as their competition soars.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: As 11 Teams depart Santa Barbara, Calif. for Santa Barbara, Argentina, one team struggles to keep their nerves at bay. Meanwhile, Teams quickly discover winning $1 million may be tougher than expected when they find themselves skydiving at 10,000 feet.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Buenos Aires, Argentina, where the stress of the Race causes one Team to break down into tears. Meanwhile, chaos ensues when Racers are required to sharpen their numerical skills at the world's largest cattle market.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The Race travels to Paraguay for the first time ever, as Teams struggle to produce during a fruity challenge, and Racers face a harsh reality if they fail to perfect a local balancing act.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: An unexpected beheading occurs as teams polish off a dirty task, and a random act of kindness leaves one team in tears.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along on an epic adventure to meet the big cats of Tanzania. These top predators include Lions, Cheetahs, and Leopards.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: In Panama's fertile volcanic valley, El Valle, Jack comes face-to-face with critically endangered Panamanian Golden Frogs and other rare and unique amphibians, before zip-lining through the valley!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: From the low-lying marshes of the Okavango Delta to the deserts and grasslands, Southern Africa's landscapes are as diverse as its wildlife.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to Akagera National Park in Rwanda, once devastated by poaching, to see its transformation and thriving populations of Hippos and Crocodiles and a homecoming for African Crowned Cranes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen travel to northern Canada for encounters with Beluga whales and Polar bears. At Churchill, the Hannas find Hudson Bay much to their liking, but nothing tops the small town's hottest summer pastime.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On a horseback safari in Botswana's Okavango Delta, Jack and his daughter Kathleen are charged by a bull elephant. Later, while riding past a scenic water hole, Jack and Kathleen observe a variety of animals, including a playful hippo.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he uncovers some of nature’s most fearsome fangs. Hippos, Rattlesnakes, Baboons, Bats, Lions, and Devils!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Carnivorous Countdown
programme.desc: Today, see how the carnivores hunt down prey, scavenge for scraps, and scare up a meal any way they can. Crocs, jaguars, lions, plus some very unsuspecting meat-eaters. Hide your lunchbox, the carnivores are coming!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Amazing Marsupials
programme.desc: From hairy-nosed wombats and legendary white wallabies to red kangaroos and fierce Tasmanian devils, this Wild Countdown hops along with ten magical moments with marsupials!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wild Guides
programme.desc: Join Jack on a Wild Countdown safari to South Africa, Peru, Kenya, Borneo, and Namibia with Jack’s favorite guides leading the way to see cheetahs, lions, rhinos, pink dolphins, and much more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top Conservation Heroes
programme.desc: Come along on this adventure as Jack counts down his heroes! From legends in the conservation world… to everyday folks who have dedicated their lives to animals, meet people who are making a difference for animals, like elephants, rhinos, horses and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he hits the road in search of amazing animal adventures. Elephant seals with their own freeway exit, a drive to the end of the Earth for dolphins, a Thai elephant expressway, and more epic road trips!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Jungle Critters
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he uncovers creatures living in the deep, dark jungle. Elusive reptiles like pythons and caimans, river-dwellers like piranha and Amazonian manatees and massive primates like lowland gorillas.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and his family meet a seldom-seen monotreme – the platypus, help veterinarians at a groundbreaking hospital and walk up to wild emus. Of course, no trip to Australia is complete without seeing some kangaroos!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack discovers Costa Rica's Tortuguero National Park. He has a once-in-a-lifetime encounter with a wild Jaguar and meets Toucans, Monkeys, and Caimans all before checking out life in the remote village.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack discovers the incredible dedication of caregivers in the hills of Tennessee's Smoky Mountains. Baby Birds, Raccoons, Possums and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Devils, Crocs & More
programme.desc: Something eerie is in the air on this Wild Countdown…millions of bats, dancing cobras, real devils and more! Come along as Jungle Jack counts down some of the creepiest creatures he’s met in dark corners around the world.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi spend the day inside Tanzania's famed Ngorongoro Crater. The dormant volcano is home to hyena, lion, hippo, wildebeest, and loads of other creatures.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads to Seminole country in the Florida Everglades and gets way more than he bargained for. This adventure's got him uncovering alligator nests, and wranglin' some big gators that need to be released back into the wild.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Panama's Bocas del Toro archipelago is home to beautiful beaches and pristine waters, and it's also home to a high concentration of Bats! Jack hikes into a remote cave for an up-close look at the beneficial species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is counting down the loud mouths of the animal world. Howler monkeys, sperm whales, wolves and lions are just a few of the famous talkers on today’s show. Find out which “call of the wild” is the loudest of all!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Bottoms Up
programme.desc: Jungle Jack goes to the ends of the Earth to meet nature's most captivating creatures! Today, adventures from the frigid waters of South America to elephant country in Africa and all the way up to Alaska's Glacier Bay.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Getting Around
programme.desc: Traveling the world in search of exotic animals, like migrating wildebeest, rare mountain gorillas, and amazing underwater sea life, Jungle Jack has hitched rides on hot-air balloons, camels, and even submarines!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: In Africa, the Lion is king! This is the only place on the planet where white lions roam free. Join Jack as he searches for Big Cats and Big Adventure in the unique arid landscape of Sanbona!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Feeding Frenzy
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is filled with delicious and nutritious adventures. From carnivores like jackals, lions, and sharks to our vegetarian friends, the elephants, Jungle Jack is gearing up for a Feeding Frenzy!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Stinkiest Stinkers
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he sniffs out the smelliest animals on the planet! Sloths, Tasmanian devils, sperm whales, binturongs, hyenas, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack for a countdown dedicated to the largest members of the great ape family… gorillas!

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Romance and intrigue combine with the mystery of a famous international jewel as The Love Boat sails amid the scenic beauty of the Aegean Sea - including the glorious sights of the Greek Islands and Turkey.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: While the Pacific Princess sails through the beautiful waters of Italy, a seemingly happy couple (Shelly Winters and Ernest Borgnine) reveals that their relationship is far from perfect.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Love, adventure and romantic hijinks are afloat when The Love Boat sails to the beautiful Eternal City of Rome and the sites of glorious Capri and Venice in a special two-hour premiere.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A mindreader meets a man and uses the reading to improve her chances at getting his attention. Meanwhile, Capt. Stubing's friend brags about his son's accomplishments, but Vicki hears a totally different story.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy is torn between his biological father, who he hasn't seen since he was a baby, and the stepfather who raised him. Meanwhile, Elaine tries to tell her parents that her fiance is a paraplegic.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A woman's (Greer Garson) ability to see the future may hinder her relationship with an attractive man. Plus, a single mother thinks she meets a divorced man traveling with his daughter, but that's not exactly the case.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Angelorum Dominicus suddenly appears aboard the Pacific Princess without a reservation and soon begins to spread love and happiness to everyone on the cruise, especially a little boy in need of an operation.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A female producer is adamant about not wanting to start a relationship with an actor, but the thespian has other plans. Meanwhile, a therapist goes on a cruise with his group, while Doc and his nephew compete for the affection of the same woman.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When Gopher suspects a skipper under Capt. Stubing's tutelage is trying to take his job, the crew jumps into action to protect their boss. Meanwhile, a lovely lady causes havoc when she boards with two men who are each after her hand.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A woman's (Joan Rivers) shyness around men is exacerbated by her recent mastectomy that is until she meets an understanding man. Meanwhile, when a married couple contemplates divorce, it's their son, who's also a lawyer, that gets caught in the middle.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When an elderly man's granddaughter falls for one of his fresh-faced friends, the man seeks out some of the youth potion for himself. Meanwhile, things start moving a little too fast for Isaac and the woman he's dating.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A sarcastic woman (Anne Meara) goes on a rampage when she finds out she's on a cruise with the same man she's suing (Jerry Stiller) for damages. Meanwhile, a famous professor meets a former student who is hired to replace his mentor/

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When Stubing meets a gorgeous movie queen (Joan Collins), who recently shed her ninth husband, he is fascinated by her charm and beauty. Then, a man decides to prioritize golf over his wife, so the neglected woman decides to play ball with an old friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In most homicides, police rely on motive to pursue a murderer. But when the killer is a stranger…the crime may go unsolved for years. It takes a full arsenal of forensic techniques…to trace… a lethal encounter.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Time of death is an important consideration in a murder investigation, but when a killer freezes, burns, or grinds his victim, even the most skilled medical examiner would be at a loss about how to calculate it.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a “black box.”

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A good coroner provides what's necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can spoil an otherwise rock-solid case. Cyril Wecht and Henry Lee, two of the country's most respected coroners, share their cases and insights into crime solving.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at the bottom of the basement stairs. As detectives look into the accident, they begin to question the sequence of events.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: What does it take to prove murder if the victim cannot be found? Investigators must go to extreme lengths to catch the killer when the victim is presumed dead.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own “fingerprint”, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Botany & Geology: Plants help provide oxygen and nutrients for existence. Soil is the fertilizer of life. Yet both can yield clues to the time and location of a person's death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some of the best clues come from the least likely places. Baffling crimes have been solved and criminals betrayed through evidence provided by insects, beer bottles, and other seemingly meaningless objects.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: New Forensic Techniques used to Solve Old Cases: Advancement in science and technology are encouraging people to revisit the past in hopes of answering questions that have remained unanswered, and solving crimes that seemed unsolvable.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Dan Willard takes on Marshal Micah Torrence's job. With no experience, he takes a tough stand with a bunch of Texas cowhands whose high spirits are evident at the saloon.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark are returning from a big cattle sale when the stage is robbed by three outlaws. Lucas, desperate to recover the money that was stolen, is determined to pursue the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas gets in trouble when he accuses the foreman of a neighboring ranch of rustling some of his cattle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Argentine family moves to North Fork. The townspeople are unfriendly to them, making fun of their clothing and customs. The Argentinean adult immigrant is openly hostile in return.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark find themselves exposed to anthrax after they adopt a stray horse whose owner has been killed in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After the end of the Civil War, General Phil Sheridan, who has been appointed Governor of the New Mexico Territory, is on an inspection tour of the country.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous gunfighter marries and decides to retire. He and his wife settle down in North Fork and open a store, but three outlaws arrive in town looking to best him in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas McCain's, a traveling photographer, comes to North Fork plying his trade. When a murder is committed, the photographer is accused of the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townsfolk of North Fork decide to give a young couple a shivaree celebration. When the drunken crowd gets out of hand and roughs up the bride-to-be, the young groom challenges them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a young boy from Brooklyn is accused of murder, Mark, believing the boy's claim of innocence, hides him until he can find the real killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart arrives in North Fork in search of renegade Indians suspected of the brutal killing of a Texas Ranger and his family.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sid Fallon tries to blackmail former gambler Julia Andueza into allowing him to use her boarding house as a gambling hall and saloon.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas puts his life in jeopardy when he agrees to testify in a murder case where the first witness was killed before he could testify, and the killer is still at large.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Outlaw Sam Morley falls in love with a young woman who has a serious illness and asks Lucas to turn him in for the reward and use the money to pay for her medical care.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas welcomes his old friend Tom Birch, who once saved his life, unaware that the man is now a bank robber on the run with his gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Dan Maury, released from Yuma prison, arrives in North Fork intent on getting even with Marshal Torrance, who helped send him to jail.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Mark McCain is eager to help lawman Jay Jefferson, who has arrived in North Fork intent on killing an outlaw for the reward, whether he is the right man or not.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas comes to the rescue when escaped convicts hold up the general store in North Fork and take Marshall Torrance hostage.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Mark manages to capture a hawk but falls into danger with a rattlesnake. A stranger comes to his rescue and Mark invites the man home, unaware that he is on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas takes in an orphaned teen being raised by his abusive uncle after there is trouble at the school.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An unfounded rumor causes North Fork's outspoken feminist schoolteacher to be attacked by a mob of angry townspeople.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras la caída de Woodbury, el Gobernador vaga sin rumbo hasta que encuentra a una familia cuyo patriarca está moribundo. El Gobernador se encariña especialmente con Lilly, una niña autista a la que promete proteger siempre.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El Gobernador se da cuenta de que el grupo de Martínez es débil, a pesar de que tienen un gran arsenal. Además, localiza a quienes le arrebataron todo lo que tenía.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El Gobernador captura a Hershel y Michonne y exige al grupo salir de la prisión. Sin embargo, Rick y su gente no van a dejarse vencer sin presentar batalla.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de la batalla contra el Gobernador, Rick y Carl encuentran una casa en la que Rick intenta reponerse de sus graves heridas y Carl sale en busca de alimentos. Mientras, Michonne trata de encontrarlos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los sobrevivientes del ataque vagan por el bosque, diseminados en grupos pequeños, en busca de cobijo. Tyreese, Lizzie y Mika se topan con una antigua conocida. Mientras, Daryl y Beth buscan a los demás y Glenn despierta en la prisión solo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick, Carl y Michonne se encuentran con un grupo de hombres extremadamente peligrosos en una casa aparentemente vacía. Mientras, Glenn y Tara conocen a unas personas que viajan hacia Washington D. C.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Beth siguen viajando juntos y Beth le revela que no quiere morir sin haber probado nunca el alcohol. A pesar de que Daryl se muestra contrario a sus intenciones, Beth se emborracha y, de esta forma, ambos se conocen mejor.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras buscan Terminus, Maggie, Sasha y Bob discuten fuertemente y terminan separándose, sin percatarse de que son más vulnerables estando solos. Mientras, Daryl y Beth han encontrado cobijo en una funeraria, pero una horda de zombis los ataca.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tyreese, Carol, Lizzie, Mika y Judith llegan a una cabaña mientras buscan Terminus. Allí, Lizzie enloquece y muestra una fascinación por la muerte que hiela la sangre de Carol y Tyreese.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn y Tara se reencuentran con Maggie, Sasha y Bob en un túnel repleto de zombis mientras se aproximan a Terminus. Entretanto, Daryl se ve obligado a viajar con el mismo grupo de hombres que quiere asesinar a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los nuevos amigos de Daryl encuentran a Rick y pretenden violar a Michonne y Carl para después matar a los tres. Mientras, Glenn, Maggie, Sasha, Bob, Tara, Abraham, Eugene y Rosita se dan cuenta de que Terminus no es el paraíso que imaginaron.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Tyreese llegan a las inmediaciones de Terminus y descubren que sus amigos están retenidos y van a ser sacrificados para ser comidos. Ahora, el destino de todo el grupo depende de ellos dos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo de Rick vaga por el bosque y encuentra a Gabriel, un párroco al que salvan de una horda de zombis y les permite pernoctar en su iglesia. Sin embargo, hay algo extraño en él y esa misma noche uno de los integrantes del grupo es secuestrado.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Gareth y su grupo de caníbales atacan la iglesia mientras Rick y sus compañeros están en el bosque buscándolos para vengar a Bob. Además, el padre Gabriel confiesa el siniestro acto de su pasado que no deja descansar a su conciencia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Beth se despierta en un hospital de Atlanta, pero pronto se da cuenta de que los mismos que la auxiliaron y sanaron no la dejarán marchar. No obstante, su nuevo amigo, Noah, y ella tratan de huir del recinto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras se dirigen hacia el norte, el grupo se ve obligado a detenerse porque una horda de zombis bloquea el camino. La tensión aumenta y la situación termina por estallar cuando Eugene confiesa un secreto que había ocultado a todos hasta ahora.

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Tom Schwarz

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Otto Wallin
