programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The roadside dining, truck stop-loving Big Rig Betty and Holly Swag, finally get a chance to even the score with the high life jet setting Miami's Sweet Heat for the brutal beatdown three weeks prior in The Main Event. Jessie Jones makes a deal.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jessie Jones strives to make good on her deal with McLane in her opening match against Genesis and be added to the Championship Challenge Main Event. Jennifer Florez challenges IQ Superior's Classmaster.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Everyone's got a problem with David McLane after last week's Championship Challenge Match. David placates the angry roster by offering all participants a chance at the new champion - who's more than willing to face each of them.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After two groundbreaking wins, Champion Abilene Maverick finally re-introduces herself to the WOW audience. Backstage, as teams start to assemble for The WOW Trios Tournament, Team Spirit has a major announcement with major ramifications.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With Amber O'Neal by her side, Jessie Jones makes her intentions towards former tag partner Americana crystal clear. With Amber by her side, however, Jessie might just provoke another former WOW Superhero to step up. Gloria Glitter aims to make a stance.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Lana Star and The Fab Four aim to be back on top with the gold this week in Penelope Pink's Main Event Championship Match against WOW Champion Abilene Maverick.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The WOW Trios Tournament officially kicks off as Team Spirit and Team IQ Superior both look to pick up the first win and advance.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next Tag Team Championship Match is on everybody's minds as The Tonga Twins set up a Fatal Four Way Main Event to determine their next challenger. The Trios Tournament continues as Stephy Slays and The Mighty Mights face a fractured Team Exile.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: There's no stopping Americana as she challenges Jessie Jones to a one-on-one contest in The Main Event, despite concerns from Santana Garrett. The Brat Pack is joined by an intriguing third member as they enter the first round of the Trios Tournament.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Last Call demands a championship match against The Tonga Twins. Las Bandidas and Tormenta hope that Latin Power can stand tall in their first trios tournament match against The Mighty Mights and Keta Rush.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's finally time for Princess Aussie's singles match against WOW World Champion Abilene Maverick as the Australian tries to prove that she'll never give up chasing her dream.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Coach Campanelli addresses the fallout from last week's Trios Tournament Match, and Team Spirit's path forward as the tournament continues with Tormenta and Las Bandidas facing Team Exile in the next semi final match.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Fab Four are incensed to find out that because of their constant attacks on The Mother Truckers, David McLane has granted Big Rig Betty and Holly Swag a Main Event tag team match against Penelope Pink and Vickie Lynn McCoy.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jessie Jones and Amber O'Neal have a new look, but it's make or break for The All American Girls as they call their shot against them for the Main Event.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is deputized to transport a ruthless killer to Tucson but exchanges him for the nun kidnapped by the killer's gang.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall brings a suspected murderer to Pot Hole but fears the man won't receive a fair trial when he finds the townspeople in the grip of a power-mad bully.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When Josh, as a favor to a friend, escorts a beautiful woman to a trial that could see her hang for killing her husband, her lover, and a foreman, she charms him to convince her of her innocenences.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is asked by Stacy Torrance for help when she finds a wanted poster under her door - for her for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Owing a favor to a sheriff, Josh agrees against better judgment to go to the lawless town of Bent Horn to bring back a man wanted for bank robbery and murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh sets out to help a heartbroken wife locate her missing husband, but his mission of mercy meets with a resistant and tight-lipped townspeople.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is bushwhacked by bounty hunters in cahoots with the local sheriff, who now must keep Josh from blowing the whistle on their illegal but lucrative \\"bounty game\\".

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A sadistic pair of killers escape from prison who have no qualms about killing.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Following an Indian attack on their stagecoach that kills his prisoner, Randall and an eastern gentleman unaccustomed to the ways of the West must trek to safety across many long, hot miles of hostile Apache territory.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On Christmas, Eve Randall receives his most daunting assignment yet from a young boy who has eight cents to pay: bring in Santa Claus.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Thieves are lying in wait to ambush mail carriers and eventually Josh is hired to help ensure that the mail will get through.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is knocked out by a posse who wants his prisoner who is wanted for killing his step-daughter.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh needs to get his wounded prisoner to Bannach in three days to prevent an innocent man from hanging.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh rides into a small town looking for Vic Warsaw but is told by the Sheriff that Warsaw was buried that day and killed by Miss Lucy Fremont the night before.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Four men break out of prison looking for revenge against Aben Starr who turned them in after their first escape attempt.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is resting in Benson when two bounty hunters bring in a man - the mayor - dead.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A grieving father who is the town drunk hires Josh Randall with his last $30 to find his murdered son's body, but Josh's search for clues runs up against a cowardly conspiracy of silence.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: At the request of his friend's wife, Randall comes to assist and protect a war buddy in his bid for the town's mayoralty, quickly running afoul of the established political machine and its corrupt mayor and wanted sheriff.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A bounty hunter is not a hero in his own hometown, as Josh learns when he honors a dying friend's request to return his body to Cameron and the townspeople rush to judgment, believing Josh killed him for the reward money.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is approached by the wife of a wanted man eager to turn himself in peacefully, provided Josh splits the bounty with his wife.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition into the desert to locate the cache of Spanish gold.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When a young runaway is framed for killing a Pinkerton agent, Randall turns detective to uncover the real killer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is requested to meet a famous singer at the opera house in Denver who has a job for him.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh comes to the aid of his old friend Jesse, who is being strong-armed into selling the Outrider Hotel and Saloon owned by his beautiful girlfriend.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A decidedly different and dangerous assignment awaits Josh when he agrees to go into the Apache camp and compete in their contests to win the hand of a woman.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Pursuing killer Joe Collins into the Superstition Mountains, Josh is followed by a man who believes Collins could be his long-lost son.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A blindly obedient religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance.

programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!
